name: Faint Haze
description:
“Faint Haze” is a 2D stealth platform game, where you play as Haze, a genetically modified rodent, who can become intangible to pass through inorganic objects or hide inside them. As a result of that manipulation, Haze also becomes sentient and capable of human thinking.

Haze’s goal is to reach the surface passing through the “Maze”. The last humans sent rovers to investigate and from what they have seen, the place has become a recreation of all different kinds of natural environments. Unfortunately, it seems that new aggressive and chimerical forms of life inhabit it. He takes some equipment with him to survive.

This was made for a school project and is in need of polishing.
Developed in 2019
